column2: "Afei iyinom nye Aaron nye Moses hɔn ebusuasantsen wɔ da a EWURADZE nye Moses kasae
column3: wɔ kokwaa Sinai do no."

column2: "Na iyinom nye Aaron ne mbabanyin no hɔn edzin; Nadab a ɔyɛ abakan no
column3: nye Abihu

column2: "Iyinom nye Aaron ne mbabanyin
column3: asɔfo a wɔseraa hɔn ngo a wotuu hɔn sii nkyɛn dɛ wondzi asɔfo no

column2: "Na Nadab nye Abihu wuwui wɔ EWURADZE enyim
column3: aber a wɔdze ananagya baa EWURADZE enyim
column5: na woennya mba ntsi Eleazar nye Itamar nko na wodzii asɔfo wɔ hɔn egya Aaron enyim."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column5: na fa hɔn begyina ɔsɔfo Aaron enyim ma wɔnsom me."

column2: "Na wɔnhwɛ n'ahwɛdze do
column3: nye mboanofo no nyinara ahwɛdze no do wɔ ehyiadzibuw no enyim
column4: mfa nyɛ ntamadan no ho edwuma no."

column2: "Na wɔnhwɛ ehyiadzibuw no ne ndzɛmba no nyinara
column3: nye Israelmba ahwɛdze no do
column4: mfa nyɛ ntamadan no ho edwuma no."

column2: "Na fa Levifo no ma Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no: wɔdze hɔn ama no koraa wɔ Israelmba no afamu."
"Na yi Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no si hɔ
column3: na wɔnhwɛ hɔn asɔfodzi no do: na sɛ ɔhɔho ba ho a wonku no."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ
column6: mafa Levifo no efi Israelmba mu ahyɛ Israelmba mu mbakan a wobue yafun mu no nyinara no ananmu; na Levifo no nyɛ medze:"

column2: "no mbakan nyinara yɛ medze. Da a mobobɔɔ Egypt asaase do mbakan nyinara no na metseew Israel mu mbakan nyinara ho maa moho
column3: nyimpa nye abowa nyina: wɔyɛ medze; emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛɛ Moses wɔ Sinai sar do dɛ
column4: "Kan Levimba no dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi
column5: nye hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee: banyin biara a oedzi bosoom nye ekyir no kan no."

column2: "Na Moses kaan hɔn dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'asɛm a ɔhyɛɛ no no tse."
"Na iyinom nye Levi mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn edzin no tse; Gerson
column3: Kohat

column2: "Na iyinom nye Gerson ne mbabanyin edzin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee; Libni nye Simei."
"Na Kohat mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee; Amram
column3: Izhar

column2: "Na Merari mbabanyin dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua tsetsee; Mahili nye Musi. Iyinom nye Levifo ebusua ebusua no dɛ mbrɛ hɔn egyanom efi no tsetsee."
"Gerson dze nye Libnifo
column3: nye Simeifo ebusua: iyinom nye Gersonfo ebusua ebusua no."

column2: "Hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu no
column3: dɛ mbrɛ mbanyin no nyinara a woedzi bosoom nye ekyir no hɔn dodow tse no

column2: "Gersonfo ebusua ebusua no nkyer nsera wɔ ntamadan no ekyir anee afamu."
"Na Lael ne babanyin Eliasaf na ɔnyɛ Gersonfo egyanom efi mu safohen panyin."
"Na Gerson ne mbabanyin no hɔn ahwɛdze wɔ ehyiadzibuw no mu nye ntamadan no
column3: nye Buw no
column8: nye dampan no n'abowano nkataano no
column10: na otwa afɔrmbukyia no ho hyia no
column11: nye ne ntampehoma wɔ no ho edwuma nyinara ho."

column2: "Na Kohat dze nye Amramfo ebusua
column3: Izharfo ebusua
column5: nye Uzielfo ebusua: iyinom nye Kohatfo ebusua ebusua no."

column2: "Dɛ mbrɛ mbanyin nyinara a woedzi bosoom nye ekyir no hɔn dodow tse no
column3: wɔyɛ mpemawɔtwe nye ahaesia a wɔhwɛ ahotseweebea ahwɛdodze no do."

column2: "Kohat ne mbabanyin ebusua ebusua no nkyer nsera wɔ ntamadan no nkyɛn wɔ pomu afamu."
"Na Uziel ne mbabanyin Elizafan na ɔnyɛ ɔsafohen panyin wɔ Kohatfo ebusua ebusua no hɔn egyanom fie mu."
"Na ahwɛdze nye adaka no
column3: nye pon no
column6: nye ahotseweebea ndzɛmba no a wɔdze som no

column2: "Na ɔsɔfo Aaron ne babanyin Eleazar na nyɛ ɔsafohen panyin wɔ Levifo asafohemfo mu
column3: na ɔnhwɛ hɔn a wɔhwɛ ahotseweebea no do ahwɛdodze do no do."

column2: "Merari dze nye Mahilifo ebusua
column3: nye Musfo ebusua: iyinom nye Merari ebusua ebusua no."

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu no
column3: dɛ mbrɛ mbanyin no nyinara a woedzi bosoom nye ekyir no hɔn dodow tse no

column2: "Abihail ne babanyin Zuriel nye Merari ebusua ebusua no mu egyanom fi mu safohen panyin: hɔn na wɔnkyer nsera wɔ ntamadan no nkyɛn wɔ kwaamu afamu."
"Na ahwɛdodze a wɔahyɛ ama Merari ne mbabanyin no nye ntamadan no ne ntaabow
column3: nye ne ndaban

column2: "na dampan no n'edum a ehyia ho no
column3: nye ne ntaease no

column2: "Na hɔn a wɔnkyer nsera wɔ ntamadan no enyim wɔ boka afamu
column3: wɔ ehyiadzibuw no enyim a odzi kɔ wipuei no
column5: nye Aaron nye ne mbabanyin a wɔhwɛ ahotseweebea ahwɛdodze no ma Israelmba no; na ɔhɔho biara a ɔbɛba ho no wonku no."

column2: "Hɔn a wofi Levifo mu a Moses nye Aaron nam EWURADZE ne mbrasɛm do kaan hɔn nyinara
column3: dɛ mbrɛ hɔn ebusua ebusua no tse no
column4: mbanyin a woedzi bosoom nye ekyir no nyinara

column2: "Na EWURADZE see Moses dɛ
column3: Kan Israelmba mu mbakan mbanyin a woedzi bosoom nye ekyir no nyinara
column4: na bu hɔn edzin no dodow ano."

column2: "Na fa Levifo no ma me (emi nye EWURADZE) fa hyɛ Israelmba mu mbakan no nyinara ananmu; nye Levifo fiembowa no hyɛ Israelmba fiembowa mu mbakan no nyinara ananmu."
"Na Moses kaan Israelmba mu mbakan no nyinara
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE hyɛɛ no no."

column2: "Na mbakan mbanyin a woedzidzi bosoom nye ekyir
column3: dɛ mbrɛ edzin dodow no tse wɔ hɔn a wɔkaan hɔn wɔ mu no mu no
column4: wɔyɛ mpemeduonu ebien ahaenu eduosuon ebiasa."

column2: "Na EWURADZE kasaa kyerɛ
column3: Moses dɛ
column5: "Fa Levifo no hyɛ Israelmba mu mbakan no nyinara ananmu
column6: na fa Levifo fiembowa no hyɛ hɔn fiembowa no ananmu: na Levifo no nyɛ medze; emi nye EWURADZE."

column2: "Na Israelmba mbakan ahaenu eduosuon ebiasa a wɔbor Levifo no hɔn dodow do no hɔn apondze no dze
column4: "gyegye hɔn tsir sika dwetɛbona enum enum dɛ mbrɛ wɔtse nkorkor; mbrɛ ahotseweebea nhyehyɛɛ tse no na gye hɔn (dwetɛbona yɛ  gera   enum):"

column2: "na fa sika no a wɔdze poon hɔn a wɔbor hɔn do no ma Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no."
"Na Moses gyegyee apondze sika no wɔ hɔn a wɔbor hɔn a Levifo poon hɔn no hɔ:"
"Israelmba mbakan hɔ na ɔgyegyee sika no; dwetɛbona apem ahaasa eduosia enum
column3: dɛ mbrɛ ahotseweebea dwetɛbona tse:"

column2: "na Moses dze apondze sika no maa Aaron nye ne mbabanyin no
column3: dɛ mbrɛ EWURADZE n'asɛm a ɔhyɛɛ Moses no tse no."
